blog.name: leave-one-wolf-alive
blog.title: The Sheep are Never Safe
blog.description:
This is a Roleplay Blog!
LOW ACTIVITY / SEMI HIATUS
semi-selective, but typically open to writing with anyone. 
Please feel free to send me asks! This blog is NOT SPOILER FREE.
My posts will contain wolves, Game of Thrones, maybe some other stuff. 
And of course, roleplays.

summary: That’s not you.  Not the Nymeria she once knew, as just like Arya she has grown and changed. The direwolf has found her place in...
caption:
That’s not you. 

Not the Nymeria she once knew, as just like Arya she has grown and changed. The direwolf has found her place in the world, she has responsibilities now, a family - a pack to lead, to protect. Her place is within the forests now. 

As much as Nymeria would have likely wanted to join her old friend, times have changed, and she cannot just drop all that she has built. She had to say no.

summary: Gendry went off by himself afterward, polishing his helm with a look on his face like he wasn’t even there. […] Arya drew second...
text: Gendry went off by himself afterward, polishing his helm with a look on his face like he wasn’t even there. […] Arya drew second watch, so she found a straw pallet in the haven. Sleep did not come easy, so she borrowed Yoren’s stone and set to honing Needle.

i hope at least someone enjoys this as much as i do lol
summary: GOT S8, Conversation in the Crypts
body:
GOT S8, Conversation in the Crypts

Arya:

Jon: [groaning] Daenerys and I are in love and related. It stinks to hear that Lord Stark had to lie to everyone to protect me. I’ve been wearing this same outfit for three fucking seasons now and I can’t freak out about my new found parentage and non-bastard status like I want to because the Night King is coming to literally end all of humanity. All of these new emotions I’m feeling are about to burst out of me, which might be super embarrassing…what if they come out my butt?

summary: Me, after reading a post stating Sansa is extremely important in the books because she has as many chapters as Jon and Dany,...
body:
Me, after reading a post stating Sansa is extremely important in the books because she has as many chapters as Jon and Dany, that Arya isn’t important in the books, and a lot of other nonsense.

Look, if you’re going to use the books to back up your claims, you should probably read them first.

summary: (Latin in + domitare: to tame; incapable of being subdued or tamed)
title: (Latin in + domitare: to tame; incapable of being subdued or tamed)
body:
This indomitable spirit refuses to give up on what she knows to be true for herself. These women have grit and the passion and persistence to go the distance, to survive and win.

Girls and women with indomitable spirit are the new protagonists in many of the most-read novels and fictional series of this century.

In Game of Thrones, Arya Stark is a young Artemis girl on her own in a devastated and dangerous world. Her once peaceful world was brought to an end, not by an earthquake which left Ayla orphaned, as natural disasters can do, but as a consequence of armed conflict. Wherever there are massive natural disasters and few resources, or ongoing fratricidal wars such as those in the Middle East and in central Africa now, and in Europe and Asia in the twentieth century, the psychological situation and dangers faced by these fictional girls are quite real to girls who lose parents, have no home to return to, and have the indomitable spirit and will to survive and not become helpless victims, no matter what. Anonymous to us, are the innumerable real life girls and women who are heroic and ordinary. 

Artemis: The Indomitable Spirit in Everywoman;  Jean Shinoda Bolen, M.D.

summary: I ran a search on Google for the most searched Game of Thrones caharactera. Unsurprisingly Daenerys and Jon Snow are at the top....
body:
I ran a search on Google for the most searched Game of Thrones caharactera. Unsurprisingly Daenerys and Jon Snow are at the top. If you play the graphic their intertwining back and forth it’s sort of romantic. LoL.

blog.name: qitnaryastark
blog.title: Nothing fucks with my baby Arya
blog.description: Call me Meli. 20's. Multifanddom. Lots and lots of fandoms.

tags: my baby and mulan best parallel or best parallel
bonus points if the story of arya becomes a legend much like mulan is
also remember how arya became friends with her bully hot pie?
also mulan becoming friends with yao
summary: The reason I love the Arya/Disney!Mulan parallels is that unlike other parallels that only have the "woman...
body:
The reason I love the Arya/Disney!Mulan parallels is that unlike other parallels that only have the “woman warrior”/“crossdressing” aspect in similar, Disney!Mulan has aaaall the aspects of Arya that are, honestly, more important than “can fight”: Mulan can’t fit into the matchmaker ideal woman material, to the despair of Mulan’s family, much like Arya’s struggles to be a lady to Septa Mordane, Catelyn and Westeros standards. Mulan angsts over this and questions whether this is who she is, just like Arya does question whether she was ever a lady.

Mulan proves right away to have tons of qualities like Arya; she has a dog companion that she makes help her with her chores (“Nymeria, gloves!” vibes?), she is kind to little girls and defends them agains other boys (Weasel anyone?), she shows intelligence to beat a man in Xiàngpí with one move(Arya is smart as hell), Mulan SERVES in the imperial army much like Arya SERVES all through her story arc.. Mulan works HARD in the army to get good at being a soldier which screams Arya (not just Syrio, but everything in the House of Black and White is training). I also love the fact thay she took out Shan Yu’s men not with force but with STREET SMARTS much like Arya survives throughout her storyline by pure wit and street smarts tbh.

Also break my heart with Mulan wishing to protect and honor her father, reminding me of little baby Arya asking Jory how many guards her father has and trying to run and save him from being beheaded. Even cooler is the fact that Mulan prays to her ancestors and then is protected by Mushu, which is a whole lot of things I could talk about Arya and the Old Gods.

Anyway, what I love most about this parallel is the idea not only that Mulan is key to defeating the Hun leader, but that she does it leading a group of soldiers faithful to her (go wolfpack!!), that she earns the respect of Manly Man Shang and the Emperor, restores her family’s honor AND she does this dressed neither as Perfect Ladylike Matchmaking Material or as Common Man Wearing Armor but in the clothes she wore every day to be comfortable.

summary: Game of Thrones’ Final Season Release Date Announced
title: Game of Thrones’ Final Season Release Date Announced
body:
HBO has released a new teaser trailer for the final season of Games of Thrones which will premiere on April 14.

The new teaser shows Jon Snow (Kit Harrington), Sansa Stark (Sophie Turner), and Arya Stark (Maisie Williams) walking through the Winterfell’s crypts, meeting at the end of the tunnel where they find statues of themselves among the dead with the cold winter creeping in.

Game of Thrones: Season 8 will be the shortest season in the series, consisting of only 6 episodes, however, Ser Jorah Mormont actor Iain Glen has previously told Daily Express the episodes will be “feature-length”. 

It’s also been reported recently via Variety that the Game of Thrones prequel series has found its main cast. Naomi Watts and Josh Whitehouse will lead the series with Naomi Ackie, Denise Gough, Jamie Campbell Bower, Sheila Atim, Ivanno Jeremiah, Georgie Henley, Alex Sharp, and Toby Regbo joining as series regulars. The pilot will be directed by SJ Clarkson whose previous work includes Marvel’s Jessica Jones, Orange is the New Black and Dexter.

Game of Thrones’ The Final Season will premiere on HBO on April 14, 2019.

Opinion: Am I incredibly excited for the final season of Game of Thrones? Yes, absolutely. Are these recent teasers doing much for me? No, not really. Either give us one proper full trailer for the season or don’t. After the first trailer, I don’t think Avengers: Endgame needs another, that gave me everything I needed. And that’s how I feel about Game of Thrones.

Looking for more from me? Follow me on Twitter to keep up to date with my latest posts, video game related nonsense, or if you just want to say hey!

Game of Thrones: Season 8 will be the shortest season in the series, consisting of only 6 episodes, however, Ser Jorah Mormont actor Iain Glen has previously told Daily Express the episodes will be “feature-length”. 

It’s also been reported recently via Variety that the Game of Thrones prequel series has found its main cast. Naomi Watts and Josh Whitehouse will lead the series with Naomi Ackie, Denise Gough, Jamie Campbell Bower, Sheila Atim, Ivanno Jeremiah, Georgie Henley, Alex Sharp, and Toby Regbo joining as series regulars. The pilot will be directed by SJ Clarkson whose previous work includes Marvel’s Jessica Jones, Orange is the New Black and Dexter.

Game of Thrones’ The Final Season will premiere on HBO on April 14, 2019.

Opinion: Am I incredibly excited for the final season of Game of Thrones? Yes, absolutely. Are these recent teasers doing much for me? No, not really. Either give us one proper full trailer for the season or don’t. After the first trailer, I don’t think Avengers: Endgame needs another, that gave me everything I needed. And that’s how I feel about Game of Thrones.

Looking for more from me? Follow me on Twitter to keep up to date with my latest posts, video game related nonsense, or if you just want to say hey!
trail.content_abstract:
HBO has released a new teaser trailer for the final season of Games of Thrones which will premiere on April 14.

The new teaser shows Jon Snow (Kit Harrington), Sansa Stark (Sophie Turner), and Arya Stark (Maisie Williams) walking through the Winterfell’s crypts, meeting at the end of the tunnel where they find statues of themselves among the dead with the cold winter creeping in.

summary:
I had a dream last night that when Arya reunited with both Jon and Gendry, she jumped on Jon, and literally attacked Gendry. 
I...
body:
I had a dream last night that when Arya reunited with both Jon and Gendry, she jumped on Jon, and literally attacked Gendry.

I really hope this is how it happens. I need to see Gendry on the ground looking up at her in awe after she takes him to within an inch of his life. Because, same.

blog.name: agirlofwinterfell
blog.title: Ned's Precious Little Girl
blog.description: A Girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell, Fangirl of Daenerys Stormborn, Pack Leader, Extroverted Wolf, as loved by Britney, rp blog Book based, few show influences      Mainblog to sideblog

summary: They never did run into the Brotherhood. Arya had heard Weasel crying, and would know that cry anywhere, and she ran for that...
caption:
They never did run into the Brotherhood. Arya had heard Weasel crying, and would know that cry anywhere, and she ran for that girl she’d claimed her own. Gendry and Hotpie had had no choice but to follow. They are all children, and not made for war. And so settling themselves into an abandoned inn, with what little-stolen coin they have, Gendry sets up Forge, Hotpie sets up kitchen, and Arya becomes the hostess that Weasel needs to make sure that little girl never goes hungry again. 

They are all bastards now, Arya, and what the townsfolk think are her lover Gendry, his brother Hotpie, and their daughter Weasel. She may look different, but they don’t judge here.

blog.name: jackoshadows
blog.title: Jak O' the Shadows
blog.description: I’m not going to swear an oath I can’t uphold. Talk about my father if you want. Tell me that’s the attitude that got him killed. But when enough people make false promises, words stop meaning anything. Then there are no more answers - only better and better lies. And lies won’t help us in this fight - Jon Snow.

tags: D&D's terrible no good writing to prop up their fave is going to hit Dany next season
The Dany Missandei friendship is so nice
Why do Dany fans desperately want her to be friends with Sansa?
summary: So Sophie Turner has given an interview where she debunked the Sansa is wearing Dany’s hairstyle nonsense:...
body:
So Sophie Turner has given an interview where she debunked the Sansa is wearing Dany’s hairstyle nonsense:

https://www.instyle.com/hair/sophie-turner-hair-color

There’s a lot of crazy fan theories about the hairstyles’ symbolism on the show. How has Sansa Stark’s hair evolved with her character? 

Then she goes back to Winterfell and returns to her mother’s hair. She created her own identity in season 7 and that kind of runs through to season 8. She’s chosen how she wants her hair to be, and she’s finally the leader and influencer instead of being influenced by everyone else.

Honestly, I am not sure why Dany fans want Dany and Sansa to be best friends. Dany already has a best friend in Missandei who is her confidante, genuinely likes her and they braid each other’s hair and discuss boyfriends. Is Missandei not enough? I would rather have more Dany/Missandei scenes of them just being girls and discussing Jon and his snobby sister and the whiny, idiot Northerners and how cold it is in the North and wonder at how large Ghost is and all the snow. 

All these comparisons of hair and wigs to somehow prove that Dany and Sansa really like each other etc. Like why? Did no one watch last season and what happened between Arya and Sansa? As per the script, Sansa nearly had Arya executed on LF’s say so. And that was her sister! The sister she grew up with. And you guys think that Sansa and Dany are going to be best buds?

All I will say is that Dany fans are going to be seriously disappointed next season if they are expecting a nice friendly relationship between these two women. As a Jon and Arya fan, I have sat through two seasons of shit writing for both these characters as their book plots and narrative themes were handed over to show Sansa to prop her up as some kind of superior leader/politician.

Expect that sort of cringy writing for Dany as she suddenly forgets how to rule and 7 seasons of character development will go down the drain. Sansa will lecture Dany on ruling - like she lectured Jon and like she lectured Arya. Despite both Jon and Arya knowing how the North works much, much better than Sansa in the books. I mean, Sansa knew how to make armor better than experienced soldiers from the Vale and the North! I would not be surprised if Sansa suddenly became a Dothraki expert who knows them better than Dany. D&D have already hinted at this sort of writing when they said that Dany had no compassion as opposed to Sansa because Sansa cried while executing her mentor of 7 seasons and Dany did not when executing some random Tarlys. Why this random comparison if they were not planning on writing Dany unfavorably compared to Sansa in season 8?

Jon and Arya fans are jaded at this point when it comes to show Sansa. Part of our dislike for show Sansa comes with how the show uses Jon and Arya’s book plots and themes to prop up Sansa and shit on Jon and Arya. And then we have to sit and listen to Sansa fans brag about how intelligent and kind and super smart and super diplomat/politician Sansa is compared to dumb Jon and psychopathic killer Arya. In the books, Jon rallied the Wildlings all by himself to go save a beloved sister. He did not need Sansa to do it for him. In the books, Jon is a savvy politician who planned Stannis’ entire Northern campaign and plays the game cleverly with Alys and the Magnar of the Thenns. In the books, Arya knows the Northern Lords well by sitting with Ned when he has conversations with them over food. In the books, Arya has traveled to the different Northern houses with Ned and often thinks of Ned’s teachings. All of that gone on the show.

I get that Dany fans have not reached this point yet. I am eager to see the reaction of Dany fans to Sansa once they start sharing scenes and Dany gets shit characterization so that D&D and Bryan Cogman can prop up their fave. And Jon and Arya fans will be on the sidelines saying - We told you so.
